meanings.definition: A person who hires or engages the services of another.
meanings.sent1: The hirer selected a skilled carpenter to fix the broken door.
meanings.sent2: The hirer interviewed several candidates before choosing the best fit for the job.
meanings.sent3: The hirer accidentally hired a magician instead of a plumber to fix the sink.
meanings.sent4: The hirer was like a conductor, carefully selecting the right musicians for the orchestra.
meanings.sent5: As a hirer, she had the important task of finding the perfect match for the position.

meanings.definition: The act of hiring or engaging the services of another.
meanings.sent1: The hirer of the construction company signed the contract with the new client.
meanings.sent2: The hirer of the event planning agency organized a successful conference.
meanings.sent3: The hirer of the pet-sitting service accidentally hired a cat to take care of the dogs.
meanings.sent4: The hirer of the talent agency had a keen eye for spotting rising stars.
meanings.sent5: In the world of business, being a hirer requires careful consideration and decision-making skills.
